title: The Land of the Incas
description: He was determined to make her suffer!Donna had been too young to know the difference between sexual attraction and mature love when she'd married Blake Mitchell. And when his plans for her to raise a family clashed with her career she'd left him.Now he had unexpectedly reappeared to head the Peruvian archaeological dig Donna had joined. It soon became clear he was not about to forget their tragic pastYet he seemed unwilling--or unable--to see that while a child had deserted him, he now faced an intelligent mature woman....
author: Kay Thorpe
